context: Major gaming company evaluating investment in advanced user engagement platform to improve player retention and monetization in competitive market

request.purpose: Development and implementation of AI-driven user engagement platform with personalized content delivery and social features
request.justification: Industry data shows 40% of players churn within 3 months; platform projected to increase retention by 25% and ARPU by 15%

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% increase in player retention, 15% increase in average revenue per user, enhanced competitive positioning

action_items: Form cross-functional implementation team by Q1 2026
Complete vendor selection and contract negotiation by Q2 2026
Launch beta testing with 10% of user base by Q3 2026
Full platform rollout by Q4 2026 with comprehensive user training
Establish ongoing platform optimization and A/B testing processes
lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement critical for complex platform decisions, comprehensive ROI modeling essential for executive buy-in
